text: @TexasTribune AT THIS POINT WHATEVER HAPPENS TO AMERICA HAPPENS.I CANT BELIEVE PEOPLE SUPPORT #TRUMP AND MAKE EXCUSES ON THE #coronavirus PANDEMIC WITH HIM. EVERY FOREIG COUNTRY LAUGHING & AMERICA, AND AMERICA STILL FIGHTING ITSELF. IS THIS WHAT I FOUGHT FOR, WHAT I BECAME 100% DISABLED FOR??
